title: Episode 84: The Battle of the Three Emperors
description:
On the first anniversary of his coronation, Napoleon faced off against a powerful Coalition army. With France's strategic situation deteriorating by the hour, he formed an audacious plan to win the war in a single stroke.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:title: The Battle of the Three Emperors
itunes:author: Everett Rummage
itunes:subtitle: On the first anniversary of his coronation, Napoleon faced off against a powerful Coalition army. He had to win a major victory.
